_config_title: SQL Server MCP Configuration for Warp Terminal
_config_docs: See docs/ENV-VARS.md for complete environment variable reference
_config_note: Method 1: CLI Tool (Recommended) - Use warp-sql-server-mcp init

sql-server._note_manual_setup: Uncomment and configure the 'env' section below if not using CLI tool
sql-server._note_path_setup: If using manual method, change 'command' to 'node' and 'args' to ['/path/to/warp-sql-server-mcp/index.js']

env._comment_required: === REQUIRED: Basic SQL Server Connection (CUSTOMIZE THESE) ===
env._comment_windows_auth: For Windows Auth, remove USER/PASSWORD and uncomment DOMAIN
env._comment_ssl: === SSL/TLS Security - SMART DEFAULTS (Usually No Changes Needed) ===
env._note_ssl_auto: SSL auto-detects: localhost/private IPs = trust certs, public domains = require valid certs
env._SQL_SERVER_ENCRYPT: true (default: true - always enabled for security)
env._SSL_SERVER_TRUST_CERT_auto: Leave unset for smart defaults based on hostname detection
env._SSL_SERVER_TRUST_CERT_explicit_prod: Uncomment next line for production: never trust certificates
env._SSL_SERVER_TRUST_CERT_explicit_dev: Or uncomment next line for development: always trust certificates
env._comment_security: === Database Security - Choose Your Security Level ===
env._note_security_defaults: Defaults to maximum security (read-only). Uncomment sections below as needed.
env._note_analysis_config: Uncomment these 3 lines for data analysis (SELECT + INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE):
env._comment_security_dev: --- Full Development Mode (All Operations - Use with Caution) ---
env._note_dev_warning: ⚠️ DANGER: Uncomment these 3 lines for full development (ALL operations including schema changes):
env._comment_optional: === OPTIONAL: Advanced Settings (Using Defaults If Not Set) ===
env._note_optional: All settings below use sensible defaults. Uncomment only if you need to override.
env._comment_secrets: --- Secret Management for Cloud Deployments (Defaults shown) ---

sql-server._note_working_dir: Uncomment and customize if you need a specific working directory
